}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== WUSB54GC v3.0 serial numbers appear to start with ''MLF2''. :This device has at least one alternate model.. WUSB54GC-LA.
The internal ''[[Gemtek]]'' model of the board may be WUBR-208G
{{WiFiCert|WFA6931|12/09/2008}}
